text: Insaan par jab koi aafat aati hai to woh apne Rubb ki taraf rujoo (return) karke usey pukarta hai, phir jab uska Rubb usey apni niyamat se nawaz deta hai to woh us musibat ko bhool jaata hai jispar woh pehle pukar raha tha aur dusron ko Allah ka humsar thehrata hai taa-ke uski raah se gumraah karey. (Aey Nabi) ussey kaho ke thode din apne kufr se lutf utha le, yaqeenan tu dozakh mein jaane wala hai
